org.jwebsocket.plugins.scripting.app.js

Class JavaScriptApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jwebsocket.plugins.scripting.app.BaseScriptApp
      • org.jwebsocket.plugins.scripting.app.js.JavaScriptApp

  • public class JavaScriptApp
extends BaseScriptApp
    The class represents the "App" global object in the JavaScript application. Contains specific JavaScript implementation for abstract methods of the BaseScriptApp class.
    Author:
    kyberneees

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        aServer - The ScriptingPlugIn reference that allows to script applications to get access to the TokenServer instance.
        aAppName - The application name (unique value)
        aAppPath - The application directory path
        aScriptApp - The scripting engine that runs the application
